meanings.definition: The action of waiting in line.
meanings.sent1: The queueing at the grocery store was long.
meanings.sent2: We had to do some queueing at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The penguins were queueing up for their favorite fish.
meanings.sent4: The queueing of ants marching in a line was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent5: The queueing for the concert tickets started early in the morning.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of items in a line.
meanings.sent1: The queueing of books on the shelf was neat.
meanings.sent2: The queueing of cars at the traffic light was orderly.
meanings.sent3: The queueing of ducks in a row made for a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: The queueing of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The queueing of students outside the classroom was well-organized.

meanings.definition: The process of organizing tasks in a specific order.
meanings.sent1: The queueing of chores helped us finish everything on time.
meanings.sent2: We needed to do some queueing of priorities for the project.
meanings.sent3: The queueing of colors in the rainbow was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: The queueing of thoughts in his mind made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The queueing of events in history shaped the world we live in today.
